summary: The INNOVATE Act (S.853) aims to improve the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. Key provisions include streamlining participation, enhancing research security by addressing foreign influence and risk, establishing new commercialization standards, and extending program authorizations. The bill introduces a new "Phase 1A" program to increase accessibility. It also focuses on fixed-price contracts, modifying definitions, data collection, and program administration, and bolstering protections against foreign influence and risk.
